channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Driver rams into New Orleans crowd, killing 10 before dying in firefight with police
item.description: Investigators were combing the French Quarter for potential explosive devices, a law enforcement official told AP.

item.title: What we know about a vehicle attack on pedestrians in New Orleans’ French Quarter that killed 10
New Orleans New Year’s Day ramming is the latest attack to use a vehicle as a deadly weapon
